Class DefaultGradient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.nn.gradient.DefaultGradient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Gradient

    public class DefaultGradient
extends java.lang.Object
implements Gradient
    Default gradient implementation. Basically lookup table for ndarrays
